column6: ALAN WILLIAM ARCHIBALD WEMYSS (*known as WAYMESS around GSM)
column7: a 40 year old male from the UK (Scotland)
column8: went to the office of the Phnom Penh Municipal Police Office. He asked for help him return him to his home country  because he lost his passport and was unable to renew his visa.------He last arrived in the country in 2016 through Phnom Penh International Airport (*although has been in and out since at least 2011). During his stay in Cambodia
column9: he has worked as a teacher in several schools
column12: penniless and passportless.------He was referred to the Ministry of Immigration for legal proceedings.------Immigration Department
